Author: sadness_throwaway_
Text: His show is so chaotic, I think he's funny but watching it stresses me out so I've stopped  you're completely valid, random things like this get me too sometimes <3

Author: thowaway764478
Text: That’s so crazy. I get it though. Have you ever seen Captain Marvel? You know when the “flerkin” turned into an alien and ate somebody? I literally cried for 2 minutes after that. It’s just I love cats so much and they’re not supposed to do that. My rational mind says it’s not possible, but in the moment I couldn’t stop the emotions. Lol what is wrong with me.
